tool_description: Converts radiographic images between different formats while preserving image quality and metadata when possible.

input_file_path.description: Path to the source image file

output_format.description: Target image format (DICOM, TIFF, PNG, JPEG, BMP)

error_messages: Input file not found: Cannot locate the specified input file.
Unsupported input format: Source image format is not supported.
Invalid output format: Target format must be DICOM, TIFF, PNG, JPEG, or BMP.
Quality level out of range: Quality must be between 1 and 100 for applicable formats.
Conversion failed: Error occurred during format conversion process.
Metadata loss warning: Target format may not preserve all original metadata.
usage: Specify input_file_path and desired output_format. Set quality_level for lossy compression formats. Be aware that some formats may not preserve all metadata.

converted_file_path.description: Path to the converted image file

conversion_summary.description: Summary of conversion process and any metadata changes

file_size_change.description: Comparison of original and converted file sizes

metadata_preserved.description: Whether original metadata was preserved in conversion
